section: CONSULTANT will be required to be available after a tournament for selected interviews, either the Sunday afternoon or Monday morning following the tournament. In all such interviews and appearances, CONSULTANT will use his best efforts to make reference to the ADAMS GOLF PRODUCT and wear [* ****] and display ADAMS GOLF'S brand name.
explanation: The redacted portion creates an ambiguity. It is unclear what the consultant is required to wear during interviews, creating a contradiction because it implies the consultant should wear something but the item is not listed.

section: For the entire term of this Agreement, from September 1, 2004 through [* ****] ADAMS GOLF shall pay CONSULTANT a base compensation of [* ****] dollars. The base compensation shall be paid upon completion of each calendar year of the contract.
explanation: The missing date creates an ambiguity, and because compensation is tied to the term of agreement, it is difficult to ascertain how much must be payed out.

section: Notwithstanding any other paragraph of this Agreement, in the event that CONSULTANT dies or is unable to play tour golf at all, ADAMS GOLF may terminate this Agreement on thirty (30) days' written notice. Upon such termination, CONSULTANT and/or CONSULTANT'S estate shall be required to repay ADAMS GOLF for that period of the Agreement not performed by CONSULTANT. The repayment amount shall be calculated in the same way as repayment is calculated under paragraph 8A.
explanation: This creates a contradiction in legal terms, paragraph 22 states that if the consultant dies, his estate would be responsible for paying Adams Golf, this is an illegal requirement as the passing of the consultant would mean that the contract is voided.
